channel.title: INsmh
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INsmh, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Mystery footprints appear at coffee shop ‘haunted by soldier from 1800s’
item.description: 'Within the first week of the shop, I kept hearing the sound of rustling noises in the office.'

item.title: Dad who woke up from coma after car crash thought it was 1980
item.description: After he was hit by a car and left in a coma in 2019, Luciano D'Adamo woke up believing the year was 1980

item.title: Fight erupts on BA plane at Heathrow over a Donald Trump MAGA hat
item.description: The pair came to blows over the slogan on the front of the cap.

item.title: Sienna Miller fronts new M&S party collection that's set to sell out–with luxe £99 dress
item.description: M&S' brand ambassador Sienna Miller has just dropped a luxe partywear collection with the high street giant. Inspired by Studio 54 it's a disco diva's...

item.title: Woman finds strange metal rod baked into her Pizza Hut takeaway
item.description: The fast food giant refused to give her a refund.

item.title: Schoolgirl, 5, left paralysed after suffering stroke during open heart surgery
item.description: Medics performing surgery on five-year-old Grace Grogan found a blood clot in her brain that led to a stroke - the schoolgirl has undergone many surge...

item.title: Man's life fell apart after he went into work on Christmas Eve for night shift
item.description: Richard Goss, 45, was on night shift when a stash of narcotics, alcohol, needles and syringes, phones and tobacco were found in HMP Buckley Hall's lau...

item.title: Valencia floods: Sickening moment woman swept away by torrential rain pouring down street
item.description: Devastating new footage shows onlookers helplessly waving their arms as the woman is swept down the street by raging floodwater following huge downpou...

item.title: Diwali Barbie Doll might celebrate my culture but she’s too light-skinned to reflect real Indian heritage
item.description: Sunita Thind argues Mattel's new Diwali Barbie reinforces stereotypes by presenting a simplistic view of Indian culture

item.title: Greggs loving runner takes on 9,600 calorie sausage roll eating marathon
item.description: A runner loves Greggs so much he built it into his marathon training regime.
